desc:
40% boost to all parameters, hugely boosts critical damage, critical damage restores HP for 3 turns & critical damage greatly boosts BB gauge
Guild Raid: Adds critical damage boost for all element types for 3 turns to SBB & greatly boosts all elemental damage
lore: Given as a symbol of both loyalty and success, this reward is highly coveted by warriors--especially those eager to prove their superiority to all others. A potent artifact of power (especially in Guild battles), those who possess this are exemplars of battle itself.
name: Crusader Medal
